data.title: Emmylou Harris
data.text:
Born: 2-Apr-1947

Birthplace: Birmingham, AL

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Country Musician

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Pieces of the Sky

Sang at the 1997 wedding reception for HealthSouth CEO Richard Scrushy.

Husband: Tom Slocum (div.)

Daughter: Mika Hallie Slocum (b. 15-Mar-1970)

Husband: Paul Kennerley (div.)

Husband: Brian Ahern (m. Jan-1977, div.)

Daughter: Meghann Theresa Ahern (b. 9-Sep-1979)

Brother: Walter Rutland Harris Jr. (older)

University: University of North Carolina, Greensboro, NC

Dolly Parton, Linda Ronstadt, Emmylou Harris 1987, 1999

Dean for America

People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals

Hit and Run Los Angeles, CA (alleged 1-Oct-2012, charged 30-Jan-2013)

Grammy 1996 for Wrecking Ball (contemporary folk album)

Grammy 1987 for Trio (with Dolly Parton and Linda Ronstadt) (country performance, group with vocal)

Grammy 1999 for After The Gold Rush (with Dolly Parton and Linda Ronstadt) (country collaboration)

Country Music Hall of Fame 2008

Risk Factors: Smoking

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Neil Young: Heart of Gold (10-Feb-2006) · Herself

Down from the Mountain (Dec-2000) · Herself

Baja Oklahoma (20-Feb-1988) · Herself

Honeysuckle Rose (18-Jul-1980) · Herself

The Last Waltz (26-Apr-1978) · Herself
